name: Balls & Bricks
description:
This version of the game has no advertising.
We recommend you to download the free version, and if you will like it, then buy this version.
You can find a free version on the Apple Store, by typing in the search: "Balls and Bricks Ruslan Goncharenko".

Specify the direction of movement of the ball to destroy as many blocks as possible.

Collect stars to get extra balls.

The level of bricks will be increased after each round you throw the balls.

It is easy to play but very hard to reach high scores.

Do not forget that the angle of reflection is the key point!
